long_description: At job sites, on powerboats or in big vehicles, the Stanley Overtime Vacuum Bottle supplies the extra security of stability while keeping your beverage hot or cold all day long. Sturdy anti-roll design features a stainless-steel handle that prevents the bottle from rolling away. Double-wall vacuum insulation keeps your beverage hot or cold for 24 hrs. Insulated lid doubles as an 8 fl. oz. drinking cup. Leakproof stopper. Closeout.
short_description: At job sites, on powerboats or in big vehicles, the Stanley Overtime Vacuum Bottle supplies the extra security of stability while keeping your beverage hot or cold all day long.
